column4: I was HACKED and am looking for help sorting out what happened
sorry but it's surprising
generally "sorting out" means flatten and reinstall
well, if the machine has been compromised you don't know what's been tampered with
you *could* go through everything and take md5sums but tbh it's more trouble than it's worth
I'm thinking along those lines
what was the box *supposed* to be running?
web server
anything that may have a remote exploit?
also the person did not hide his files well I found them in /dev/.\ /.ssh with find -mtime 0
not that I know of
think the files I found were a decoy or the bag of tricks?
don't know, tbh
rkhunter alternative ?
no, I get *paid* to code in assembly, I *like* coding in Forth
:) lol wow
what do you make?
all sorts of things
pretty much everything from web apps to tiny tiny embedded controllers
nice ... ever use this: http://www.rfxn.com/projects/ or something like it?
nope
